ygData.subject: RE: AW: [eqbards] Katanas
ygData.msgSnippet: and the look is really cool =) That s about it. Mu ... From: Egelhof, Tobias [mailto:tobias.egelhof@eds.com] Sent: Friday, July 20, 2001 9:35 AM To:
ygData.messageBody:
"and the look is really cool =)"

That's about it.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Egelhof, Tobias [mailto:tobias.egelhof@...]
Sent: Friday, July 20, 2001 9:35 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: AW: AW: [eqbards] Katanas


its worth a lot, much more than you can pay i assume. i guess over 10k
minimum. we looted it from a giant in the kael drakkal arena region, mob was
level 50+.

the haste seems to grow with character level, so people say. check
allakhazam for more info on it.

and the look is really cool =)

tobi

Betreff: Re: AW: [eqbards] Katanas

I'm going to ask, just because you said not to... how much for it? And
how rare is it? Rare as is forget it, even if I get my cleric on a kael
raid there's no f***ing chance she'd even be able to roll for it, or
regular old trash weapon to be given to twinks?

"Egelhof, Tobias" wrote:

> velium swiftblade from kael ;) looks like a katana. stats are 1hs 5/24
>
> effect haste. dont ask for price =)
>
> tobi
